name: Art Arcade
description:
PROTOTYPE

The idea is to create an arcade game based on how the art world operates. Instead of life and energy, the player will have to collect prizes, scholarships, manifests, and watch out for bad ideas, evil curators, and colleagues with intentions to put an end to your career.

CONTROLS
W,A,S,D + Mouse = Move
E + Left Mouse Button = Interact
Escape or P = Pause
Tab = Objective

SHORT DEVELOPMENT STORY
2015 – Idea and research
2016 – Level design
2021 – Updated prototype

CREDITS
Termodress
Beta and test player Ludwig Bøen-Zahl

Royalty free and creative common assets, 3D models, audio, materials and textures by various artists at:

A SURREALIST GAME
